::: {.cell}

### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/F3_5.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/F3_5_valid.qmd).

- Indicative Map (**code: F3.5.IM.orig**, version v1.0) requires review 
 - Web navigation (**code: F3.5.web.orig**, version v1.0) superceeded 
 - Web navigation (**code: F3.5.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) superceeded 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **ESRI-2020-Landcover** (Karra et al. 2021).
 - **FEOW-2008** (Abell et al. 2008).
 - **Global-irrigation-areas** (Deepak Nagaraj).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset                 |url                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|:-----------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|ESRI-2020-Landcover     |<https://samapriya.github.io/awesome-gee-community-datasets/projects/esrilc2020/?s=09>{target='links'} :: <https://caitlin-kontgis.medium.com/mapping-the-world-in-unprecedented-detail-7c0513205b90>{target='links'} :: <https://www.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=d6642f8a4f6d4685a24ae2dc0c73d4ac>{target='links'} :: <https://www.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=fc92d38533d440078f17678ebc20e8e2>{target='links'} |
|FEOW-2008               |<https://www.feow.org/>{target='links'} :: <https://geospatial.tnc.org/datasets/38da4656e8074e1c820c42cc21cd76cd_0>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|Global-irrigation-areas |<https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.4659476>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**F3.5.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/F3.5.IM.orig_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

**F3.5.web.orig** (v1.0): [GitHub repository](F3.5.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/F3.5.web.orig_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091001){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/F3.5.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](layers/F3.5.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset                 |license_info                                                           |
|:-----------------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------|
|ESRI-2020-Landcover     |Creative Commons BY-4.0 license                                        |
|FEOW-2008               |https://www.feow.org/copyright :: custom license :: non commercial use |
|Global-irrigation-areas |https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode                  |


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Abell R, Thieme ML, Revenga C, Bryer M, Kottelat M, Bogutskaya N, Coad B, Mandrak N, Contreras Balderas S, Bussing W, Stiassny MLJ, Skelton P, Allen GR, Unmack P, Naseka A, Ng R, Sindorf N, Robertson J, Armijo E, Higgins JV, Heibel TJ, Wikramanayake E, Olson D, López HL, Reis RE, Lundberg JG, Sabaj Pérez MH, Petry P (2008) *Freshwater ecoregions of the world: A new map of biogeographic units for freshwater biodiversity conservation*, **BioScience** 58: 403–414. DOI:[10.1641/B580507](https://doi.org/10.1641/B580507) 
 - Deepak Nagaraj, Eleanor Proust, Alberto Todeschini, Maria Cristina Rulli, Paolo D'Odorico (2021) *A new dataset of global irrigation areas from 2001 to 2015* **Advances in Water Resources** 152: 103910 [DOI:j.advwatres.2021.103910](http:dx.doi.org/j.advwatres.2021.103910) 
 - Karra, Kontgis, et al. (2021) *Global land use/land cover with Sentinel-2 and deep learning* **IGARSS 2021-2021 IEEE International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium** IEEE
